translations: n.（Bozo）人名；（阿拉伯）布祖；（法、土）博佐；（西）博索；（波黑）博若

phrs.translation: 家伙, 笨蛋, 的中文翻译及用法, 壮汉
怪人过滤器, 无用物过滤器, 过滤程序

sentences.sentence: He looks like Bozo the clown.
She shook her lice-likely head. “Write that on down, Bozo.
sentences.translation: 她摇晃着很有可能长虱子的头，“伙计，把这个记在上面。

sentences.sentence: Bozo seemed an interesting man, and I was anxious to see more of him.
sentences.translation: 博佐像是个有趣的人，我很想跟他多见几次面。
